description: This traditional Italian dish pairs great with your favorite wine. For an extra kick add some crushed red pepper!
title: Baked Italian Eggplant
ingredients:
3 tbsp Cannabis-infused olive oil

2 cloves garlic, minced

1 large green bell pepper, sliced

1 medium yellow onion, roughly chopped

5 Italian sausages (about 1 lb)

1 small carton mushrooms, sliced

1 tbsp Italian seasoning

1 tsp fennel seeds

1 (6 oz) can tomato paste

¼ cup red wine

kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

2 large sprigs of fresh basil

2 ½ cups mozzarella cheese, shredded

1 large eggplant, sliced about ½-inch thick

¼ cup Parmesan cheese, shredded
directions:
1. Heat the Cannabis-infused olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic, bell pepper, and onion and cook until soft, about 5 minutes.

2. Add the Italian sausages, and cook, turning as needed, until golden, about 8 minutes more. Then add the sliced mushrooms and sauté this mixture until the mushrooms reduce in volume, 5 more minutes. Add the Italian seasoning and fennel and cook 3 minutes more.

3. Add the tomato paste and cook 2 minutes. Add the red wine reduce for 2 minutes, then add 1 ½ cups water.

4. Stir this mixture on low on the stove top until well-combined, about 5 minutes. Let this mixture simmer on low for 45 minutes. After the 45 minutes are up, remove the Italian sausages, transfer to a serving platter, and keep warm. Season the sauce with salt and pepper.

5. Heat the oven to 375°F. Spread half of the sauce mixture and sprinkle half the mozzarella cheese onto the bottom of a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Lay the sliced eggplant down evenly allowing for overlapping and season with salt and pepper, to taste.

6. Spoon the remaining sauce and sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese over the eggplant slices. Cover the baking dish with tinfoil. Bake for 55 minutes.

7. Remove the tinfoil and sprinkle the shredded Parmesan cheese over the dish. Bake for another 5 minutes, then remove the dish from the oven to serve. Garnish with fresh basil leaves.

description: Looking to get lifted while still eating healthy, then this is your dish.
title: Baked Lemon Chicken
ingredients:
3 tbsp CannaButter, melted

4 chicken breasts

⅓ cup chicken broth

4 tbsp fresh lemon juice

1 tbsp honey

2 tsp garlic, minced

1 tsp Italian seasoning

salt and pepper to taste

fresh rosemary and lemon slices for garnish
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F and grease a baking sheet or large casserole dish.

2. Melt CannaButter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook chicken 2 - 3 minutes on each side just until browned. Transfer chicken to prepared baking sheet.

3. In a small bowl, whisk together chicken broth, lemon juice, honey, garlic, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper.

4. Pour sauce over chicken. Bake 20 - 30 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Every 5 - 10 minutes spoon the sauce from the pan over the chicken.

5. Garnish with fresh rosemary and lemon slices, if desired, and serve.

description: Enjoy these sweet and fluffy muffins as a tasty treat or with some coffee. But be careful, their potency will creep up on you!
title: Banana Chocolate Chip Muffins
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaButter

¼ cup butter, melted

1 ½ cups all-purpose flour

½ cup granulated sugar

1 ½ tsp baking powder

¼ tsp salt

1 ¼ cup bananas, mashed (about 3 small bananas)

1 large egg

¼ cup milk

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 cup chocolate chips

2 tbsp coarse raw sugar
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Line twelve ⅓ cup muffin cups with paper or foil muffin liners. Or alternately grease and flour 12 muffin tin cups.

2. Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt in a small bowl, set aside.

3. In a large bowl, use a potato masher or the back of a large spoon to mash the ripe bananas.

4. Add egg, milk, melted CannaButter and butter to the mashed bananas and mix with a large spoon until all ingredients are well incorporated.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

5. Stir the dry ingredients into the bowl until combined, do not over mix.

6. Stir in chocolate chips.

7. Divide the mixture between the 12 muffin cups and sprinkle the tops with the coarse raw sugar.

8. Bake for about 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out without cake crumbs. Cool on a wire rack.

(note) - If you plan to freeze, cool completely before wrapping and labeling.

description: The perfect dish to combine your dream of breakfast and cannabis. Start your day off right.
title: Belgian Waffles
ingredients:
1 ½ cups CannaMilk

(optional) 1 tbsp Cannabis-infused maple syrup per waffle

1 ¾ cup all purpose flour

2 tsp baking powder

½ tsp salt

1 tbsp white sugar

3 large eggs

7 tbsp vegetable oil
directions:
1. Preheat your waffle iron before starting to mix the batter.

2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.

3. Make a well in the middle. Break the eggs into the well and beat lightly with a fork. Add the oil and CannaMilk and stir until moistened.

4. Using a spoon, put the batter into your waffle maker and cook until golden and crispy.

(optional) - Add Cannabis-infused maple syrup.

description: What is every football party missing - cannabis! Spice up your next party and show everyone how to really enjoy the game.
title: Buffalo Wings
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

1 cup CannaMilk

32 oz oil (for frying)

1 cup all-purpose flour

2 tsp salt

½ tsp pepper

½ tsp cayenne pepper

¼ tsp garlic powder

½ tsp paprika

1 large egg

3 chicken breasts (skinless, boneless, & cut into ½ inch pieces)

4 tbsp hot sauce
directions:
1. Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375°F.

2. Combine flour, salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and paprika in a large bowl.

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg and milk.

4. Dip each piece of chicken in the egg mixture, and then roll in the flour blend.Do this twice so that each piece of chicken is double - coated.

5. Refrigerate breaded chicken for 20 minutes.

6. Fry chicken in the hot oil.Cook until the exterior is golden brown, and the juices run clear, this should take around 5 - 6 minutes.

7. Combine hot sauce and butter in a small saucepan.Heat sauce on medium until melted.Pour sauce over the cooked chicken;mix to coat.

description: A special twist on an American classic. You have never enjoyed banana bread like this.
title: CannaBanana Bread
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter melted

1 ½ cups all-purpose flour

1 cup white sugar

½ cup sour cream

½ cup walnuts, chopped

2 eggs

2 bananas, sliced

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 tsp baking soda

½ tsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F. Grease a 9 × 5 inch loaf pan.

2. In a large bowl, stir together the melted CannaButter and white sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, then add the vanilla, mix well.

3. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt, stir it into the CannaButter mixture until it's smooth. Lastly, fold in the sour cream, walnuts and sliced bananas. Spread evenly into the prepared loaf pan.

4. In the preheated oven, bake it at 350°F for about 60 minutes. You can use a toothpick that's inserted into the center of the loaf, when it comes out clean it's ready.

5. Cool loaf in the pan for about 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack to allow it to cool completely.

description: The staple product for cooking most cannabis edibles. With CannaButter you can create some amazing special recipes.
title: CannaButter
ingredients:
6 grams Cannabis

16 oz unsalted butter
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder.

(note) - This baked Cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Heat the butter in a medium saucepan over medium - low heat.Add the baked Cannabis and cook, taking care not to let the temperature go over 200° F for about 45 minutes.

5. Remove from heat and let sit, undisturbed, for 10 minutes, before straining through a colander lined with cheesecloth, set over a bowl.Press carefully with a spoon to extract as much butter as possible.

(note) - The CannaButter will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 8 weeks.

description: Get faded while you  satisfy your sweet tooth.
title: CannaCandy
ingredients:
3 tsp Cannabis tincture

1 cup sugar

½ cup light corn syrup

¼ cup filtered water

1 tsp orange or lemon flavor
directions:
1. Combine in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat sugar, light corn syrup, and filtered water.

2. Stir until sugar is completely dissolved.

3. Once boiling, insert a candy thermometer. Do not stir after your mixture starts to boil.

4. When your thermometer reads 300°F, immediately remove from heat; keep your thermometer in the pot.

5. When the temperature drops to 250°F, stir in orange or lemon flavor, and Cannabis tincture.

(note) - If orange or lemon is not your desired flavor, then replace with what you prefer.

6. Carefully pour into lollipop molds or candy molds.

7. Allow to cool completely at room temperature for about 15 - 20 minutes.

8. Store in an airtight container.

description: These aren’t your grandma’s caramels…
title: CannaCaramels
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaButter

vegetable oil (for greasing pan and parchment)

1 cup heavy cream

¼ cup butter

¾ cup granulated sugar

¾ cup dark brown sugar light or dark

½ cup corn syrup light or dark

½ tsp salt

1 ½ cups pecans or walnuts toasted, chopped

1 ½ tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Lightly oil a 5 x 9 inch loaf pan, then line the bottom and at least halfway up the sides with parchment paper.

2. Place cream in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat, add CannaButter and regular butter, heat until butters are melted. Gently stir to combine well.

3. Stir in sugar, brown sugar, corn syrup and salt until combined. Place lid on the pot and cook for 1 minute.

4. Remove lid and attach a candy thermometer to the pan. Cook without stirring until the mixture reaches 245°F then immediately remove from heat and quickly stir in nuts and vanilla. Pour mixture into the prepared pan.

5. Let stand until cool.

(note) - Place in fridge to speed up the cooling process.

6. Then use parchment paper to remove caramels from pan. Cut into 4 rows by 9 columns to make 36 individual candies.

description: Turn your next baking creation up to 1000! This infusion is perfect for those who have excess shake, stalks, and leaves.
title: CannaFlour
ingredients:
16 grams Cannabis flowers, stalks, and leaves

utilize parts of the plant that would usually be tossed out to decrease cost
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet. If you are adding stalks and leaves, try to separate them.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes (stirring every 10 minutes), taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn. 

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove the Cannabis to cool.

4. Grind your Cannabis in a food processor or blender until super fine.

5. Store in an airtight container in a dark, cool place.

description: For those chocolate lovers out there, this is a must have! Serve with some CannaMilk for the perfect snack.
title: CannaFudge
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaButter

3 cups semisweet chocolate chips

14 oz sweetened condensed milk

(optional) 8 oz marshmallow
directions:
1. Spray 8 x 8 inch baking pan lightly with cooking oil.

2. Put all ingredients into a microwave safe mixing bowl. Cook on high for 5 minutes, stopping to stir once or twice. Stir well.

3. Pour mixture into prepared pan.

4. Cool.Cut into 24 equal sized pieces.

description: Gummies that will have you pondering the reason your did not try this sooner.
title: CannaGummies
ingredients:
½ cup Cannabis-infused coconut oil

½ cup cold water

3 oz packet of flavored gelatin

2 tbsp plain unflavored gelatin

½ tsp sunflower / soy lecithin
directions:
1. Turn your stove on low heat. In a pot add the water, Cannabis-infused coconut oil, and sunflower/soy lecithin.

2. Continue stirring the mixture until it has a consistent texture and the coconut oil has completely melted. Now, add in the flavored gelatin and the unflavored gelatin while continuing to stir throughout this process.

3. Whisk extensively on low heat for 10 - 15 minutes until the gelatin is completely dissolved. Make sure it does not come to a boil; make sure that all the ingredients are thoroughly combined.

(note) - Do not stop stirring this mixture for the entire 15 minutes.

4. While leaving the pot on low heat, start filling up the gummy bear molds with a dropper (a dropper is a mini turkey baster that comes with most gummy bear molds).

(note) - Make sure to move quickly. If your liquid starts to separate, it's because the mixture has started to cool. It's critical that you move fast otherwise the oil may separate in the pot. You need to continue whisking throughout the pouring process otherwise the mixture may start to harden and stop binding.

5. Put the gummy bear molds into the freezer for 20 - 25 minutes.

description: Perfect to pair with some cookies, pour into your morning cereal, or make a protein shake.
title: CannaMilk
ingredients:
6 grams Cannabis

2 cups whole milk or heavy cream
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. This baked Cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Heat the milk in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the baked Cannabis and cook, taking care not to let the temperature go over 200°F for about 45 minutes.

5. Remove from heat and let sit, undisturbed, for 10 minutes, before straining through a colander lined with cheesecloth, set over a bowl. Press carefully with a spoon to extract as much milk as possible.

(note) - The CannaMilk will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 8 weeks.

description: An essential utility for all serious cannabis connoisseurs.
title: CannaOil
ingredients:
6 grams Cannabis

2 cups oil (olive, canola, or coconut)
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. This baked Cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Heat the oil in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the baked Cannabis and cook, taking care not to let the temperature go over 200°F for about 45 minutes.

5. Remove from heat and let sit, undisturbed, for 10 minutes, before straining through a colander lined with cheesecloth, set over a bowl. Press carefully with a spoon to extract as much oil as possible.

(note) - The CannaOil will keep, covered and refrigerated, for up to 8 weeks.

description: The ideal infusion to be used on any of your next baking creations.
title: CannaSugar
ingredients:
3 grams Cannabis

½ cup high-proof alcohol (160+ proof)

½ cup granulated sugar
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Remove from the oven and cool before grinding into a coarse powder. This baked Cannabis will keep in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 2 months.

4. Reduce the oven to 200°F.

5. Transfer the Cannabis to a jar and cover with the alcohol. Screw the lid on tight and shake every 5 minutes for 20 minutes.

6. Strain through a cheesecloth set over a bowl, discarding solids.

7. Mix the alcohol with the CannaSugar and spread into an even layer in a glass 9 x 13 inch baking dish. Bake, stirring occasionally, until the alcohol has evaporated and the CannaSugar is lightly golden.

description: Hazelnut spread so good, you won’t be able to put it down!
title: CannaTella
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaOil

1 cup hazelnuts

12 oz milk chocolate

3 tbsp powdered sugar

1 tbsp cocoa powder

½ tsp vanilla extract

pinch of salt
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 350°F and bake the hazelnuts for 12 minutes.

2. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. In a separate mixing bowl, blend the toasted hazelnuts at high speed.

4. Add CannaOil, cocoa powder, powdered sugar, vanilla extract and salt to mixing bowl.

5. Blend again.

6. Now add your melted chocolate to mixing bowl and blend all together.

7. Sieve CannaTella through a colander lined with cheesecloth, into a bowl.

8. Jar and store

description: You can’t go wrong with coconuts and cannabis. This healthy alternative can be used to replace most oils.
title: Cannabis Coconut Oil
ingredients:
¼ - ½ oz Cannabis

1 cup coconut oil
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Place the Cannabis in a strong mason jar, add coconut oil.

(optional) - Add 1 tsp of sunflower lecithin.

4. Place your closed jar in cold water, then let it come to a boil. (Boil for 2 - 3 hours.)

5. Strain through a cheesecloth.

6. Let it cool.

7. Now it’s time to enjoy the Cannabis Coconut oil.

description: If bears knew about this version of honey, we would be in trouble …
title: Cannabis Honey
ingredients:
3.5 grams of Cannabis

1 cup of honey
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Every 10 minutes, gently mix the buds with a light shake of the tray to expose the surface area of the buds equally.

4. Combine the Cannabis and honey in a double boiler to apply gentle heat on the stove top.

5. Simmer. Maintain low heat and let the mixture simmer for at least 40 minutes. The mixture should never come to a full boil.

6. Strain the honey. Set a funnel on top of a jar and line it with cheesecloth. Once the honey has cooled off, pour it over the cheesecloth funnel and allow it to strain freely.

CannaHoney can be stored in a cool dark area for 1 - 2 months.

description: If you enjoy the classic olive oil and vinegar, this will blow your mind!
title: Cannabis Olive Oil
ingredients:
½ - 2 oz. Cannabis

1 large mason jar

1 large pot of water

4 cups of olive oil


½ oz. garlic or ginger
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.


2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. While your Cannabis is baking, take a large pot of water and start to heat it. 

(note) - Put the mason jar cap on the bottom of the pot so your glass jar can rest on it. 

4. Peel and coarsely chop your garlic or ginger and place them in the jar. 


5. After baking the Cannabis in the oven, add it to the jar. Pour olive oil into the jar, making sure to cover all of the product.

6. Place jar in the warm water for 1 - 2 hours at a medium low temperature, approximately 150 - 200°.

(note) - Use a cooking thermometer to make sure the desired temperature is reached.

7. After the Cannabis and oil have been bound, strain CannaOil using cheesecloth over a strainer.

(note) - It's very important to keep these oils refrigerated or frozen after use! IF NOT REFRIGERATED OR FROZEN CORRECTLY THE GARLIC OR GINGER IN THE OLIVE OIL CAN PRODUCE BOTULISM!

description: Step up your peanut butter and jelly game with this tasty classic.
title: Cannabis Strawberry Jam
ingredients:
1 cup CannaSugar

2 lb strawberries, hulled

3 cups white sugar

¼ cup lemon juice
directions:
1. In a wide bowl, crush strawberries in batches until you have 4 cups of mashed berry. 


2. In a large saucepan, mix together the strawberries, sugar, CannaSugar, and lemon juice.

3. Process in a water bath. 

(note) - If the jam is not going to be eaten right away, don't bother with processing, and just refrigerate.

4. Stir over low heat until the sugar is dissolved. Increase heat to high and bring the mixture to a full rolling boil. Boil, stirring often, until the mixture reaches 220°F. Transfer to hot sterile jars, leaving ¼ - ½ inch headspace, and seal.

5. Stir before serving.

description: The ideal snack for movie night. Be careful, sweet and salty is a deadly combination.
title: Caramel Popcorn
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter

1 gallon popcorn, popped

1 cup brown sugar

½ cup corn syrup light

½ tsp salt

½ tsp pepper

1 tsp vanilla extract

½ tsp baking soda
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 250°F. Spray a large shallow roasting pan with cooking spray and add popcorn.

2. In a separate bowl mix brown sugar, corn syrup, CannaButter, and salt in a heavy saucepan.

3. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil over medium heat. Boil 5 minutes without stirring. Remove from heat. Stir in baking soda and vanilla; mix well.

4. Pour syrup over warm popcorn, stirring to coat evenly.

5. Bake for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.

(note) - Keep refrigerated for extended shelf life.

description: Turn your next Italian dinner into a night to remember … unless you have too much cannabis.
title: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients:
½ cup CannaOil

1 jar of your choice of tomato pasta sauce

4 - 6 lb chicken breast, skinned and cleaned

1 pack of cremini or button mushrooms

1 medium-sized onion (red or white)

rosemary to taste

salt and pepper, to taste
directions:
1. Add 1 - 2 tbsp of CannaOil to a large skillet on low heat. Let this oil heat up for a couple of minutes.

2. Open your pack of chicken breast and place pieces onto the hot skillet.

3. Dice the onion and slice the mushrooms, then place both into the skillet with the chicken. Cook the chicken, mushrooms and onion on medium heat for 10 - 15 minutes or until golden brown. Add a little salt and pepper to taste.

(note) - You can cover the pan with a lid to retain moisture.

4. While the chicken and veggies are roasting, in a small-medium saucepan empty your tomato sauce. Add the remainder of the CannaOil to the saucepan. Add finely chopped rosemary and salt and pepper to taste.

5. Stir this sauce and allow it to reach a light boil. Once hot and ready, place it off to the side.

6. Once the chicken is done cooking, pour the cannabis-infused tomato sauce over the chicken in the large skillet and mix with a spatula to get it evenly coated with sauce.

7. Serve immediately

description: A snack like no other. This sweet and simple treat will be your next favorite.
title: Chocolate CannaBananas
ingredients:
½ tsp CannaOil or CannaButter


½ banana, sliced

1 tbsp dark chocolate chips
directions:
1. Combine CannaOil or CannaButter and chocolate chips in an oven safe bowl.


2. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. Stir cannabis-infused chocolate until smooth.

4. Add bananas, and coat well.

5. Place CannaBananas on parchment paper, dust with sprinkles if desired, and freeze.

6. Serve once cooled in refrigerator.

description: The classic American dessert, which will have you coming back for more. Pair with CannaMilk for the ultimate treat.
title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter

3 cups all-purpose flour

2 cups chocolate chips

1 cup white sugar

1 cup brown sugar

2 eggs

2 tsp vanilla extract

2 tsp hot water

1 tsp baking soda

½ tsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F.

2. Cream CannaButter, white sugar and brown sugar together in a bowl, then beat in eggs. Stir in the vanilla.


3. Dissolve baking soda in hot water then add to mixture.

4. In a separate bowl, sift flour and salt; stir into butter mixture. Finally add the chocolate chips.

5. Get a baking tray & cover it in parchment paper. Place cookies with large spoonfuls of dough on the tray, evenly spaced apart. There should be about 24.

6. Bake for about 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until edges are nicely browned.

(note) - Slightly undercook for soft and gooey cookies.

description: You can’t go wrong with sweet and salty. The only this better is sweet, salty, and cannabis.
title: Chocolate Covered Pretzels
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaButter

3 tbsp cocoa powder

3 tbsp powder sugar

1 bag pretzels
directions:
1. In a double boiler melt the CannaButter.

2. Once the CannaButter has melted, sieve in the cocoa powder & powder sugar.

3. Stir on low heat until the ingredients have completely mixed together. Mix thoroughly until there is consistency, then turn the heat off but leave the pot on the stove.

4. Place a pretzel in the Cannabis chocolate mixture and push it below the surface with a fork to coat. Carefully remove, shake off any excess chocolate, and place onto a lined baking sheet.

5. Refrigerate the pretzels until the chocolate is hard, about 1 hour.

description: The cliche edible for every stoner. Enjoy the rich fudge flavors, while you get lifted.
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownies
ingredients:
5 tbsp CannaButter

5 tbsp unsalted butter

4 oz bittersweet chocolate

4 oz semi-sweet chocolate

2 large eggs

1 cup granulated sugar

2 tsp vanilla extract

¼ tsp kosher salt

1 cup cake flour, sifted
directions:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F.

2. Grease a 9 x 13 inch baking pan with regular butter and line with parchment paper. Grease parchment paper and set pan aside.


3. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.


4. Combine the regular butter and CannaButter with the melted chocolate over a bain marie. Cook, stirring, until melted and smooth, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and set aside.

5. Whisk the eggs together in a large bowl. Add the sugar, vanilla, and salt and whisk to combine. Stir in the chocolate mixture and fold in the flour.

6. Spread the batter evenly into the prepared pan and bake until the brownie forms a thin skin on top but the batter is still loose in the center, about 18 to 20 minutes.

7. Transfer the pan to a rack and let cool completely before slicing.

description: An easy way to spice up any dessert.
title: Chocolate Sauce
ingredients:
¼ cup CannaButter

3 oz unsweetened chocolate

¼ cup butter

¼ tsp salt

1 ⅔ cup granulated sugar

6 oz evaporated milk

1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Melt the chocolate over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.


2. Combine the regular butter and CannaButter with the melted chocolate over a bain marie. Cook, stirring, until melted and smooth, about 5 minutes.


3. Stir in sugar, stirring to combine and incorporate before adding more. 

(note) - Slowly add more to avoid clumps.

4. Slowly stir in the evaporated milk, a little at a time, until everything is completely mixed. Continue to cook and stir until sugar has completely melted and sauce is smooth, about 3 minutes.

5. Use now for hot Cannabis-infused chocolate sauce or cool completely and package in a lidded container and refrigerate. Microwave for about 10 seconds to reheat before using.

description: Fair food on an entirely different level.
title: Churros
ingredients:
¼ cup Cannabis coconut oil

1 cup all-purpose flour

½ tsp baking powder

½ tsp salt

2 tbsp sugar

1 cup water

32 oz oil (for frying)

½ tsp vanilla extract

3 tbsp ground cinnamon

4 cups sugar
directions:
1. In a large mixing bowl, mix flour, baking powder, salt, 2 tbsp of sugar and set aside.

2. Add the Cannabis coconut oil along with 1 cup of water to a pan over medium heat, whisk constantly.

3. Once the water starts to boil, immediately pour it into the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar bowl. Blend this with an electric mixer until it's consistent. 


4. Add the vanilla extract and keep blending until the dough becomes smooth. Transfer the churro dough to a piping bag.

5. Pour the 32 oz of oil into a high-sided skillet over medium-high heat until it reaches 375°F. Squeeze out a 6-inch strip of churro dough directly into the oil and fry for about 2 minutes until the churros are golden brown.

6. Once the churros are cooked, remove them from the oil using tongs.

(note) - Place cooked churros onto a plate lined with paper towels to soak up excess oil.

7. Combine 4 cups of sugar and cinnamon in a large zip lock bag. set aside.

8. Once the churros are cooked, let them cool down. Add the churros to the bag and shake lightly allowing the churros to be completely coated in the cinnamon sugar.

description: A twist on a European classic that will have you wanting more than just one.
title: Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients:
¾ cup CannaMilk

2 ¼ tsp active yeast

¼ cup granulated sugar

1 egg yolk, room temperature

¾ cup CannaButter

3 cups bread flour

¾ tsp salt

⅓ cup brown sugar

1 ½ tbsp ground cinnamon

4 oz cream cheese, softened

¾ cup powdered sugar

½ tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Add warm Cannabis milk to the bowl of an electric mixer and sprinkle yeast on top.

(note) - You will know if the yeast has activated if it begins to foam after a few minutes. If it hasn’t, then start over; your Cannabis milk was either too hot or too cold.

2. Once yeast begins to foam, add in sugar, egg, egg yolk and Cannabis butter. Mix until well combined. Next, stir in flour and salt with a wooden spoon until a dough begins to form.

3. Place dough hook on the mixer and knead the dough on medium speed for 8 minutes. The dough should form into a nice ball and be slightly sticky.

(note) - If you don’t want to use an electric mixer, you can use your hands to knead the dough for 8 - 10 minutes on a well-floured surface.

4. Transfer dough ball to a well-oiled bowl, cover with plastic wrap and a warm towel. Allow dough to rise for 1 hour, or until doubled in size.

5. After the dough has doubled in size, transfer the dough to a well-floured surface and roll out into a 9 x 14 inch rectangle. Spread softened Cannabis butter over dough, leaving a ¼ inch margin at the far side of the dough.

6. In a small bowl, mix together brown sugar and cinnamon. Use your hands to sprinkle mixture over the buttered dough.

7. Tightly roll dough up, starting from the 9 inch side and place seam side down making sure to seal the edges of the dough as best you can.

8. Cut into 1 inch sections with a serrated knife or floss. You should get 9 large pieces.

9. Grease a 9 x 9 inch backing pan or round 9 inch cake pan. Line the pan with parchment paper to catch any filling that leaks out.


10. Place cinnamon rolls in the pan. Cover with plastic wrap and a warm towel and let rise again for 30 minutes.

11. Preheat oven to 350°F.


12. Remove plastic wrap and towel and bake cinnamon rolls for 20 - 25 minutes or until just slightly golden brown on the edges. 

(note) - Underbake the cinnamon rolls a little so they stay soft in the middle.


13. Allow them to cool for 5 minutes before frosting.

14. In the bowl of an electric mixer, combine cream cheese, Cannabis butter, powdered sugar and vanilla extract. Beat until smooth and fluffy. Spread over cinnamon rolls and serve immediately.

description: Nothing beats the aroma of coffee and cannabis in the morning.
title: Coffee
ingredients:
1 gram Cannabis

1 tbsp coconut oil

2 cups coffee, brewed
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 245°F.


2. Grind the Cannabis, put it into a small oven-safe bowl and add the coconut oil. Cover the bowl with foil and place it in the oven for 20 minutes.

3. Remove the bowl from the oven and strain the oil with cheesecloth to rid it of plant matter. 


4. Add the Cannabis coconut oil to the coffee and serve with Cannabis-infused coffee creamer to taste.

description: Cookies, cheesecake, and cannabis … can it get any better?
title: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

1 tbsp butter

24 of your favorite cookies

divide 3 (8 oz) Philadelphia cream cheese packets

¾ cup sugar

1 tsp vanilla

3 eggs
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 330°F.

2. Place 16 of the cookies in resealable plastic bag. Flatten bag to remove excess air, then seal bag. Crush cookies by rolling a rolling pin across the bag. 


3. Place crushed cookies in a medium bowl. Add regular butter and CannaButter, mix well. Press firmly onto bottom of 9 inch springform pan.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

4. Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating just until blended.


5. Chop or crush remaining 8 cookies. Gently stir half of the chopped cookies into cream cheese batter. Pour batter over prepared crust. Sprinkle top of batter with the remaining cookies.

6. Bake 45 minutes or until center is almost set. Let cool. Refrigerate overnight.

description: The perfect bitesized snack from your childhood made to meed your adult standards.
title: Doughnut Holes
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter, melted

2 tbsp unsalted butter, melted

3 cups bread flour

1 cup granulated sugar

4 ½ tsp baking powder

1 tsp kosher salt

1 cup whole milk

1 tsp vanilla extract

1 large egg

canola oil (for frying)
directions:
1. In a medium bowl, mix the flour, ¼ cup sugar, baking powder, and salt. 


2. In the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with a paddle attachment, combine milk, CannaButter, regular butter, vanilla, and egg. Add in the dry ingredients and mix until a sticky dough forms.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

3. Heat 4-inches oil in a 1 ½ gallon saucepan until a deep-fry thermometer reads 350°F.


4. Working in batches, roll about ½ oz batter into a loose, sticky ball; carefully slide into oil and fry, turning often, until puffed and golden, 2 - 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer doughnut holes to a baking sheet with a wire rack.


5. Repeat with remaining dough.


6. Let doughnuts cool completely before tossing in remaining sugar to coat.

description: What is more iconic than coffee and doughnuts? Coffee, cannabis, and doughnuts!
title: Doughnuts
ingredients:
1 tbsp CannaButter, melted

1 tbsp unsalted butter, melted

2 cups flour

¾ cup granulated sugar

2 tsp baking powder

½ tsp salt

2 eggs, lightly beaten

1 cup whole milk

2 tsp vanilla extract

½ cup granulated sugar

2 tbsp cinnamon

½ cup powdered sugar

½ tsp vanilla extract

½ tbsp milk

pinch salt
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F and lightly grease your doughnuts pans.

2. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.

3. In a separate bowl, combine, eggs, milk, CannaButter, regular butter, and vanilla extract.

(optional) - Replace the regular butter with CannaButter if you desire an increase in the potency of the muffins.

4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and mix until just combined.

5. Fill doughnuts pan ¾ full (about 3 tbsp each), and spread the batter into an even layer.

6. Bake for 15 - 17 minutes.

(note) - The doughnuts are ready when a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

7. To release doughnuts from the pan, let them cool slightly, turn pan over and beat it gently on the table.

Powdered Sugar Doughnuts — add about ⅓ cup of powdered sugar into a paper lunch bag. Toss doughnuts in the bag one at a time until they are coated evenly with powdered sugar.

Cinnamon Sugar Doughnuts — melt 2 tbsp CannaButter and 2 tbsp of unsalted butter in a small bowl. In a separate bowl, mix together your cinnamon and sugar. Dip both sides of the doughnuts in the butter and then both sides in the cinnamon sugar.

Glazed Doughnuts — whisk together 2 cups powered sugar, ¼ cup milk and 1 tsp vanilla extract, until smooth. Set doughnuts on cooling rack and drizzle glaze over with a spoon.

description: Enjoy this creamy classic with a pairing of your favorite wine.
title: Fettuccine Alfredo Pasta
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter

24 oz dry fettuccine pasta

15 oz heavy cream

¾ cup Romano cheese, grated

½ cup Parmesan cheese, grated

1 dash garlic salt

salt & pepper, to taste
directions:
1. With the large pot, bring lightly salted water to a boil. Then add the dry pasta and cook for 8 - 10 minutes or until ready, drain the pot.

2. In the saucepan, melt the CannaButter and cream on low heat. Then add your salt, pepper and garlic salt.

3. Stir in the cheese over medium heat until it’s melted.

4. Finally, add the pasta to the sauce. Make sure to use all the sauce and ensure the pasta is entirely coated.

description: The most classy way to consume you cannabis and alcohol.
title: French 75
ingredients:
1 oz Cannabis-infused Ford’s gin

1 oz simple syrup

1 oz lemon juice

4–5 oz Champagne or sparkling wine
directions:
1. Combine first three ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake hard for ten seconds and strain into a champagne flute.

2. Top with a few ounces of Champagne or sparkling wine and garnish with a lemon twist.

description: Satisfy your cannabis cravings and munchies all in one snack.
title: French Fries
ingredients:
⅔ cup CannaOil (coconut or olive oil)

4 large potatoes, peeled

3 tbsp salt
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F and line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.

2. Cut the peeled potatoes into strips (into desired shape) and spread them evenly on the baking sheet.

3. Drizzle the CannaOil over them and season with salt. Try to coat each fry relatively evenly with the oil so that there is a consistent potency.

4. Cook the fries until they are golden brown. Around 15 - 20 minutes.

5. Allow the fries to cool down, around 5 minutes.

6. Divide the fries into equal proportions and serve.

description: A simple, yet tasty twist on an Italian dish everyone loves.
title: Garlic Parmesan Pasta
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

2 tbsp unsalted butter

1 lb angel hair pasta

salt and pepper, to taste

7 garlic cloves, roughly chopped

¾ cup Parmesan cheese
directions:
1. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until light brown, 3 - 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside.

2. Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes. Drain it, reserving ½ cup pasta water.


3. Return the pasta to the pot you cooked it in and add the garlic, butter, salt, and pepper.

4. With a large fork and spoon combine the ingredients well, then add a ½ cup of the grated Parmesan cheese and the pasta water and continue to combine gently.

5. Transfer the pasta to a large platter and top it with the remaining Parmesan.

description: For those chefs are a bit more ambitious with their edibles dishes. A great way to impress your friends and family.
title: Gnocchi in CannaButter
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

3 large baking potatoes

1 tbsp olive oil

1 large egg, slightly beaten

1 tsp baking powder

3 cups of all-purpose flour (add more if needed)


3 cloves garlic

salt, to taste

(optional) grated Parmesan, Asiago, or Romano cheese
directions:
1. Boil potatoes (skins on) in salted water until done. While hot, remove skins, then put potatoes through a sieve to insure no lumps.

2. Using a large wooden spoon, combine potatoes, egg, and baking powder until fairly well mixed together.


3. Flour a board, then mix and kneed the potato/flour mixture until it resembles bread dough.

4. Roll out a portion of dough to the width and length of a cigar and cut into 1in bits.

5. Place a fork upside down then roll the uncut side of the dough pieces over the fork. Roll one piece of dough at a time and cover the remaining portion to keep them from getting dry.

(note) - This is to add some small ridges to one side of the gnocchi.

6. Cook one or two pieces for about 4 minutes. Remove and taste them. They should be firm but not too hard.

7. When you have finished cutting all the pieces, place them on a floured board or cookie sheet and sprinkle lightly with flour.
(note) - These can be covered with a dish towel for use the same day or frozen on the cookie sheet, then placed in a plastic bag for future use.

8. If you are going to use them right away, boil some salted water in a large pot adding a tbsp of olive oil. Add the pieces of gnocchi. When they rise to the top of the water, cook for about five minutes. Gently pour into a large sieve or colander.

9. While still in the colander, rinse gnocchi under hot water to remove the flour you topped them with. This will keep them from sticking when you add the melted CannaButter and garlic mixture.

10. Heat a saucepan to medium heat and add a little coconut oil or olive oil with the CannaButter. Now add chopped garlic, browning lightly. 


11. Slowly pour over the boiled gnocchi.


(optional) - Sprinkle well with grated Parmesan, Asiago, or Romano cheeses and add your favorite red sauce on the gnocchi after pouring the butter/garlic.

description: If you are looking for the best way to enjoy cannabis and alcohol, you have found it! Just add this to any of your favorite drinks and prepare for a wild night.
title: Green Dragon
ingredients:
3.5 grams Cannabis

25 oz vodka

34 oz heat-tolerant whipped cream whipper

2 nitrous oxide chargers
directions:
1. Pour 8 - 9 oz vodka into the whipper. Add the Cannabis into the whipper.

(note) - If you use ⅓ of a bottle of vodka, then weigh out ⅓ of an eighth of Cannabis.

2. Attach the nitrous charger to the whipper and then release the gas. Unscrew the charger and attach the second charge and release the gas again. After the second charge, let it sit for a minute or two and then open it up.

3. Next, take out your double boiler. Heat the water in the lower part of the double boiler to around 200°F. Pour the infused alcohol into the top of the double boiler.

4. Simmer the alcohol at this temperature in the top of the double boiler for about 45 minutes.

(note)- This will reduce the mixture a bit, so add vodka to match whatever volume is lost in order to maintain the original volume.

5. Next, remove the top pot from the double boiler and set aside.


6. Using a glass-measuring cup, put a small metal strainer on top and then set some cheesecloth into the strainer. Pour the Cannabis liquid into the glass-measuring cup and strain out the leftover Cannabis.

7. After straining, add enough of vodka to bring it back to the original volume (250 ml).

8. Now you can use this liquid, Green Dragon, as a substitute for the base spirit in your favorite cocktail.

description: So versatile it can be used on most of your favorite dishes.
title: Guacamole
ingredients:
1 tbsp CannaOil

2 avocados, peeled and pitted

1 cup tomatoes, chopped

¼ cup onion, chopped

¼ cup cilantro, chopped

2 tbsp lemon juice

kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste


(optional) 1 jalapeno pepper, minced
directions:
1. Mash avocados in a bowl until creamy.

2. Mix tomatoes, CannaOil, onion, cilantro, lemon juice, and jalapeño pepper into mashed avocado until well combined, season with salt and black pepper.

3. Serve the Cannabis Guacamole.

description: Cozy up to the fire with cannabis and hot chocolate.
title: Hot Chocolate
ingredients:
½ cup CannaMilk

2 ½ cup milk

⅓ cup semisweet chocolate graded

1 tbsp white sugar

½ tsp cinnamon, ground

6 tbsp whip cream
directions:
1. Heat CannaMilk and milk in saucepan on medium heat for 2 mins.

(note) -  Replace regular milk with CannaMilk to increase potency.

2. Mix in chocolate, sugar, and cinnamon.

3. Return to heat and cook on medium for 3 - 4 minutes or until foamy.

(note) - Do not let mixture boil.

4. Whisk until smooth and pour into 3 mugs.

(optional) - Garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon & 2 tbsp of whip cream.

description: Great for a pick-me-up on a hot day. Cool down while you get high.
title: Iced Coffee
ingredients:
½ cup CannaMilk

½ cup warm water

2 tsp instant coffee granules

10 ice cubes

½ can (5 oz) sweeten condensed milk

1 tbsp chocolate syrup
directions:
1. In a small bowl, stir together the water and instant coffee.

2. In a blender, combine ice cubes, coffee mixture, CannaMilk, sweetened condensed milk, and chocolate syrup. Blend until smooth.


3. Pour and enjoy!

description: Cannabis, potatoes, and tradition. Just make sure you use Kosher Kush.
title: Latkes
ingredients:
5 grams Cannabis buds, ground

4 cups vegetable oil

5 lb Russet potatoes, unpeeled

3 cippollini onions (or 2 regular onions)

2 large eggs, beaten

½ cup all-purpose flour

1 tsp kosher salt

1 tsp black pepper, grated
directions:
1. Using a double boiler, heat the vegetable oil until it simmers. Add the ground Cannabis, and simmer for 60 minutes over low heat, stirring often.

2. Meanwhile, finely shred the potatoes. Keep the shredded potatoes from turning grey by immersing them in water. When all the potatoes have been grated and you are ready to use them, drain them thoroughly. Grate the onions and set aside.

3. Preheat oven to 250º F and place a baking sheet inside.


4. When the Cannabis-infused vegetable oil is ready, strain the fiber out (with cheesecloth) and reserve the oil.


5. Drain the potatoes and press them against the colander to squeeze all the water out.

6. Mix the grated potatoes and onions in a large bowl. Add the eggs, salt and pepper. Mix well to combine. Add the flour and mix again.

(note) - You may need to add a little more flour if the mixture seems too loose.

7. Heat ½ cup of the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.

(note) - Test the oil by dropping a tsp of the latke batter into the pan; if it turns brown within one minute, then the oil is ready.

8. Make your latkes by frying one heaping tbsp of batter, until golden brown on each side.


9. Transfer the latkes on a bed of rice or couscous to help catch the excess Cannabis-infused oil. 

10. After the excess oil is drained off each latkes, transfer it to the oven to keep warm on the baking sheet. Repeat this process in batches until all the latke batter is used up.


11. Reserve any remaining oil for another purpose.

12. Serve latkes with sour cream and applesauce.

description: Send out tropical vibes with this cool take on a classic cocktail.
title: Mai Tai
ingredients:
7 grams of dried Cannabis

25 oz rum

½ oz orange Curaçao

⅕ oz simple syrup

1 lime

⅕ oz orgeat

fresh pieces of pineapple

1 oz pineapple juice
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F and grind up Cannabis.

2. Spread ground Cannabis over a lined baking tray and bake for about 30 - 45 minutes.

3. After taking your Cannabis out of the oven, let it cool down and put it in a large Mason jar, together with the rum. Shake it well and keep doing this every now and then while leaving it in a dark area for 5 - 7 days.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the jar, the more tasty and potent it will become.

4. Add pineapple juice, orange Curaçao, orgeat, and simple syrup to your glass of Cannabis-infused rum. Fill with chunks of ice and shake or stir vigorously.

5. Serve immediately

description: The ideal drink to enjoy on a hot summer day.
title: Mango Breeze
ingredients:
1 - 2 grams Cannabis

ice cubes

25 oz vodka

3 cups mango chunks

2 ½ oz cranberry juice

2 ½ oz mL orange juice

1 lemon
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F.


2. Grind up Cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl and cover with foil. Cover the bowl with foil and put it in the oven for 35 minutes.


3. Once the Cannabis has finished decarboxylating, transfer it to a small container and pour in some vodka until the Cannabis is covered and soaked. Cover the container and store it in the fridge for 24 hours (up to 7 days) to infuse the vodka.

(note) - The longer the mix stays in the container, the more potent it will become.

4. Strain the Cannabis-vodka mix into a blender using cheesecloth and discard the plant matter.

5. Add the mango chunks, cranberry juice, and orange juice to the blender with the crushed ice, then slice the lemon and squeeze out the juice. Blend the ingredients until smooth.


6. Serve in a glass with ice

description: Canadians are known for their maple syrup, but it has always been missing something …
title: Maple Syrup
ingredients:
3-6 grams Cannabis, ground

2 cups maple syrup of choice
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F. Grind up Cannabis and spread it out evenly on a baking sheet.

2. Bake the Cannabis for 35 - 40 minutes, taking care not to let the Cannabis go over 250°F and burn.

(note) - If this happens, you can lose potency.

3. Set up a double boiler by placing a heat-resistant bowl over a pot of boiling water and pour the maple syrup into the bowl to heat up until it’s at 160°F.

4. Grab the Cannabis from the oven, transfer it onto a cheesecloth and tie it up into a bundle.


5. Submerge the cheesecloth bundle into the heated syrup for 1 - 2 hours then remove the syrup from the heat, squeeze out the cheesecloth and allow the CannaSyrup to cool.

description: Tequila and cannabis … what could go wrong?
title: Margarita
ingredients:
1 oz Cannabis leaf juice

25 mg Cannabis tincture

Cannabis leaf, edible flowers, or greens of choice, to garnish

1 oz tequila

1 oz aquavit

¾ oz lime juice

¾ oz agave syrup

1 pinch sea salt
directions:
1. In a shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, aquavit, lime juice, agave syrup, green juice, salt, and Cannabis tincture.

2. Shake, then fine strain into a lowball glass with one large ice cube.

3. Garnish with a Cannabis leaf, edible flowers, or your favorite greens.


4. Serve immediately.

description: The iconic American dessert, so delectable you’ll want to find the entire cake.
title: New York Cheesecake
ingredients:
1 tbsp CannaButter, melted

1 tbsp butter, melted

15 Graham crackers, crushed

4 packages (8oz) of cream cheese

5 cups of white sugar

¾ cup milk

4 eggs

1 cup sour cream

1 tbsp vanilla extract

¼ cup all-purpose flour
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F. Grease a 9 inch springform pan.

2. Mix Graham cracker crumbs with your melted butter and CannaButter. Press the mixture to the bottom of the springform pan.

3. In a different bowl, mix cream cheese with sugar until smooth. Blend in the milk, then mix in the eggs one at a time. Add the sour cream, vanilla, and flour, then mix until smooth. Pour the filling into the prepared crust.

4. Bake for about an 60 minutes. Turn the oven off, remove from oven, and let it cool for 5 - 6 hours to prevent cracking. Place in a refrigerator to chill.

5. Serve and enjoy!

description: The American south had always been known for their cobbler. Enjoy with some CannaMilk to really get lifted.
title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter, melted

⅔ cup CannaMilk, room temperature

1 cup CannaFlour

1 ¼ cup granulated sugar

½ cup brown sugar

1 tsp baking powder

¼ tsp salt

1 egg

peach filling

8 fresh peaches, chopped

(optional) ¼ tsp cinnamon, ground

(optional) ¼ tsp nutmeg
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.

2. Pour melted CannaButter into a 9 x 13 inch baking dish.

3. Mix CannaFlour, 1 cup of the granulated sugar, baking powder and salt together. Add CannaMilk and egg. Stir just until all dry ingredients are moistened. 

(note) - Do not over stir.

4. Pour mixture evenly over the melted CannaButter. Let sit, do not stir.

5. Combine peaches, spices, brown sugar and remaining granulated sugar into saucepan over high heat.

6. Stir constantly while waiting for the peach mixture to boil.

7. Pour the hot peaches into the baking dish evenly over the batter and melted CannaButter. Do not stir.

8. Bake for 45 minutes in preheated oven. Cobbler is ready when batter rises and is golden brown.

description: Great for pairing with some many other foods. If peanuts are not your favorite, replace them with nut of choice.
title: Peanut Butter
ingredients:
2-3 grams Cannabis

2 tbsp coconut oil

2 cups dry roasted peanuts

1 tbsp honey

1 tsp kosher salt
directions:
1. Heat the oven to 250°F.


2. Grind up Cannabis and put it in an ovenproof bowl with the coconut oil. Cover the bowl with foil and place it in the oven for 35 minutes.

3. Remove the bowl from the oven and using cheesecloth, strain the oil to rid it of the plant matter.


4. Add the Cannabis-infused coconut oil to a food processor along with the nuts, stevia and salt. Process for 4 - 5 minutes until smooth.

5. Put your Cannabis-infused peanut butter in a sealed container and store it in the fridge, or immediately spread it on a slice of bread and enjoy!

description: Liven up you CannaFudge with some nut butter. Your taste buds will thank you for the sweet and salty combo.
title: Peanut Butter CannaFudge
ingredients:
½ cup CannaMilk

2 cups white sugar

1 cup chunky peanut butter

1 tsp vanilla extract

(optional) 8 oz marshmallow
directions:
1. Grease an 8 × 8 inch baking pan.

2. In a saucepan bring to a boil the sugar and CannaMilk. Let boil for 2 minutes, stirring often.

3. Remove from heat. Add the peanut butter and vanilla and mix until smooth.

4. Pour into a pan and let cool. Slice into 24 equal sized squares.

(optional) - Top fudge with marshmallows.

description: When chocolate, cannabis, and peanut butter come together, great things happen.
title: Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients:
½ cup CannaButter

6 tbsp cocoa powder

6 tbsp powdered sugar

4 tbsp powdered sugar (sifted)

½ cup peanut butter
directions:
1. Prepare a cupcake tin with 6 liners.

2. Melt the CannaButter over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place CannaButter in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.

3. Once the CannaButter has melted, sieve in the cocoa powder & 6 tbsp of powder sugar.

4. Stir on low heat until the ingredients have completely mixed together. Mix thoroughly until there is consistency. Turn the heat off but leave the pot on the stove.

5. In a separate bowl, stir all of the peanut butter and powdered sugar together until smooth.

6. Spread 1 tbsp of the Cannabis chocolate mixture in the bottom of each cupcake liner.


7. Dollop 2 tsp of the peanut butter mixture on top of the chocolate. Cover each dollop of peanut butter with 1 more tbsp of chocolate and smooth out the top.

8. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chocolate has hardened. Remove peanut butter cups from the liners & enjoy!

description: If you are pressed for time or just do not want to bake, this is your recipe.
title: Peanut Butter No Bake Bars
ingredients:
¾ cup CannaButter, melted

2 cups graham cracker crumbs

12 oz peanut butter

2 cups powdered sugar

1 bag (12 oz) semi-sweet chocolate chips
directions:
1. Mix all ingredients, except chocolate chips. Beat until thoroughly mixed and crumbly. Press into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan.

2. Melt the chocolate chips over a bain marie. 

(bain marie) -  Place chocolate chips in a heatproof bowl and heat on top of a pot of hot water.


3. Spread melted chocolate evenly over graham mixture. Let Stand until chocolate hardens. Cut into small squares.

4. To store, place in a sealed container.

description: Mac and Cheese that will have you coming back for more.
title: Pesto Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

3 tbsp unsalted butter

10 oz baby spinach

10 oz asparagus

5 oz cremini mushrooms

1 cup parsley

1 cup basil

1 cup grated Parmesan cheese

1 garlic clove

3 ½ cups whole milk

⅓ cup all-purpose flour

12 oz grated sharp white cheddar cheese

kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

1 lb elbow macaroni
directions:
1. Heat the oven to broil.

2. Melt half of unsalted butter in medium saucepan over medium heat and grill asparagus till tender. Add cremini mushrooms roughly 3 minutes prior to fully cooked asparagus.

3. In a food processor, combine the spinach, parsley, basil, Parmesan, and garlic and purée until chunky. Add ½ cup milk and purée until smooth.

4. Melt the butter in another medium saucepan over medium heat; add the flour and cook 2 minutes.


5. Add remaining 3 cups milk and cook, stirring occasionally, until thick, 8 - 10 minutes.


6. Stir in half of the cheddar cheese, salt, and pepper and cook until the cheese has melted.

7. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes.


8. Drain pasta, transfer to cheese sauce along with the asparagus, cremini mushrooms, spinach and herb blend and stir well to coat.

9. Spread pasta in a 9 x 13 inch baking dish and top with remaining cheese. Transfer baking dish to a baking sheet and broil until macaroni and cheese is golden brown and bubbly, about 5 - 7 minutes.


10. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving.

description: The best movie night treat, other than cannabis-infused caramel popcorn.
title: Potato Chips
ingredients:
2-5 grams ground Cannabis

⅔ cup coconut oil

3 tbsp salt

3 medium-sized potatoes

1 tbsp pepper

1 tbsp garlic powder
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 240°F and put your ground Cannabis in an ovenproof bowl.


2. Add the coconut oil to the bowl over the Cannabis and place it in the oven for 30 minutes to decarboxylate.

3. Remove the Cannabis-infused coconut oil from the oven and strain using a sieve lined with cheesecloth to rid it of plant matter. Set the strained Cannabis-infused coconut oil aside.

(note) - You can use melted CannaButter for this as well.

4. Fill another bowl with ice cold water and stir in salt.


5. Peel your potatoes, then slice them into paper-thin pieces using a mandoline slicer. Add the potato slices into the bowl of salty water as you cut and let them soak for 30 minutes.

6. Drain the potatoes, place the slices on paper towels and pat them to dry.


7. Put the potatoes back into the bowl and drizzle the Cannabis-infused coconut oil over them, along with the pepper and garlic powder. Mix with your hands to make sure all the potato slices are covered in the oil and spices.

8. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and arrange the potato slices on it. Bake in the oven at 400°F for 15 minutes, until it’s crisp and golden brown.


9. Remove your Cannabis-infused potato chips from the oven and allow to cool before serving.

description: Become a grilling legend with this succulent and spicy steak recipe.
title: Ribeye with Chimichurri Sauce
ingredients:
2 tbsp CannaButter

(optional) 8 Cannabis fan leaves, finely chopped

32 oz parsley, chopped

½ cup fresh garlic, chopped

1 tsp red chili flakes

2 tsp dried oregano

1 tbsp red wine vinegar

2 cups canola or other neutral oil

2 cups olive oil

2 bone - in ribeye steaks

kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

¾ cup olive oil
directions:
1. In a large bowl mix parsley, garlic, red chili flakes, oregano, red wine vinegar, salt, and oils.

(optional) - Add diced Cannabis leaves to mixture.

2. Rub the steaks with generous amount of salt and pepper. Let rest in fridge uncovered for ten hours or overnight. Take out of fridge 2 hours before cooking and allow to come to room temp.

3. In a large cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat, warm the remaining ¾ olive oil. Working with one ribeye at a time, cook, flipping once, until well browned and cooked to desired doneness.

(note) - The timing will depend on the thickness of the steak.


4. Transfer ribeye to a cutting board and let rest for 10 minutes. Repeat with remaining steak.

5. Cut steaks against the grain into slices about ½ inch thick and transfer to individual plates. Serve topped with CannaButter and accompanied by the chimichurri sauce.

description: Spice up your seafood recipe with this cannabis-infused curry dish.
title: Shellfish Curry
ingredients:
2 tbsp Cannabis-infused coconut oil

12 oz crab or lobster meat

1 tsp Jamaican curry powder

1 garlic clove, minced

1 tsp onion, granulated

pinch cayenne pepper

½ cup coconut milk

¼ cup chicken broth

salt, to taste
directions:
1. Melt the Cannabis-infused coconut oil in a large skillet over medium heat.

2. Add the crab or lobster and cook slightly, 2 minutes.

3. Stir in the curry powder and garlic, then add the granulated onion, and cayenne.

4. Stir in the coconut milk and chicken broth and reduce slightly, about 3 minutes.

5. Season to taste with salt and serve.

description: A classic too good to pass up. Enjoy the distinct flavors only sardines can deliver, while basking in the feeling only cannabis can give you.
title: Spicy Sardine Spaghetti
ingredients:
3 tbsp Cannabis-infused olive oil

5 garlic cloves, minced

½ head fennel, diced, fronds reserved for garnish

1 (4oz) can sardines

1 tsp chili flakes

¼ cup white wine

1 (15oz) can whole peeled tomatoes, crushed

1 lb spaghetti

kosher salt and ground black pepper, to taste

8 oz Cannabis-infused or regular Ricotta cheese
directions:
1. Heat 3 tbsp Cannabis-infused olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low.


2. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. Add the fennel and sardines and cook until the fennel is soft, 4 minutes. Add the chili flakes and cook 1 minute more.

3. Add the white wine and cook until reduced slightly, 2 minutes. Add the tomatoes and cook until slightly thick, 3 - 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and keep warm.

4. Bring a large pot of generously salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, about 5 minutes.

5. Drain, reserving ½ cup pasta water. Toss the pasta in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.

(note) - Add a bit of cooking liquid if needed to thin it out slightly.

6. Divide among bowls and top each with a dollop of ricotta. Drizzle with Cannabis-infused olive oil to serve and garnish with the fennel fronds.

description: Savor the sweet taste of strawberries with every bite. This cobbler with leave you highly satisfied.
title: Strawberry Cobbler
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter, softened


40 oz strawberries, sliced

2 cups all-purpose flour

1 tsp baking powder

1 tsp salt

½ cup light brown sugar

2 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside when evenly combined.

2. In a large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.

3. Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.

4. In a 9 x 13 inch baking pan, layer strawberries berries. Add crumbled dough evenly across fruit.

5. Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

description: For those who like fruity alcoholic beverages, but still want to get lifted. Get the best of both worlds with every sip.
title: Strawberry Gin Smash
ingredients:
1 - 3 gram Cannabis

½ tsp granulated sugar

1 lime wedge

3 fresh strawberries (2 hulled and sliced and 1 reserved for garnish)

3 oz gin

club soda

fresh mint sprig, for garnish
directions:
1. Preheat oven to 240°F. Grind up Cannabis and place into small ovenproof bowl and cover with foil.


2. Place the bowl in the oven for 30 minutes then remove and transfer the baked Cannabis to mason jar.

3. Pour some gin into the jar until the Cannabis is covered and soaked, seal the jar and shake for 60 seconds.

4. Fill a crock-pot with water until about ¼ full, set it on low and place the jar in the crock-pot. Allow the Cannabis-gin mixture to infuse in the crock-pot for 8 hours

(note) - Open the jar every hour to release pressure.

5. Next, line a funnel with cheesecloth and place it over a blender. Remove the Cannabis-infused gin jar from the crock-pot and poor contents through the funnel into the blender.


6. Add a cup of ice cold water, strawberries, lemon juice, sugar, and salt to the blender. Blend until smooth, serve in a glass with a kiwi wedge and enjoy!

description: Show you local diner how to make a proper milkshake with this innovative twist.
title: Strawberry Milkshake
ingredients:
1 ½ cup CannaMilk

4-7 grams Cannabis

1 can (13.6 oz) coconut milk

2 cups milk

12 oz strawberry ice cream

2 frozen bananas

1 cup frozen strawberries

3 tbsp maple syrup

1 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. Preheat your oven to 245°F and line a baking sheet with foil.


2. Grind your Cannabis onto the baking sheet and bake it for 20 - 25 minutes.

3. After the Cannabis is done baking, remove it from the oven and set it aside.


4. Put a saucepan on the stove over medium heat, pour in 2 cups of milk, add in the Cannabis and let it simmer for 40 minutes while whisking occasionally.

(note)- Be careful not to boil as it will degrade the potency of your cannabis mixture.

5. Strain the CannaMilk into a jar using a colander lined with cheesecloth. Discard the plant matter and store in the fridge to cool.

6. Add the coconut milk, CannaMilk, ice cream, bananas, strawberries, maple syrup and vanilla, and blend until smooth.

7. Pour your milkshake into a mason jar and store in the fridge for several hours until it’s chilled and creamy.

description: You can’t go wrong with cobbler. This is the perfect dish for you next summer party.
title: Summer Berry Cobbler
ingredients:
1 cup CannaButter, softened


16 oz strawberries, sliced

12 oz blackberries

6 oz raspberries

6 oz blueberries

2 cups all-purpose flour

1 tsp baking powder

1 tsp salt

½ cup light brown sugar

2 tsp vanilla extract
directions:
1. In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside when evenly combined.

2. In a large bowl, beat together CannaButter, sugar, and vanilla using hand mixer or standing mixer. Mix until smooth.

3. Combine dry ingredients to CannaButter and sugar mixture. Slowly mix until mixture consists of pea sized crumbles.

4. In a 9 × 13 inch baking pan, layer mixed berries. Add crumbled dough evenly across fruit.

5. Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30 minutes until golden brown.

description: Looking for a quick and easy treat? These no bake cookies will be your best friend.
title: Toffee No Bake Cookies
ingredients:
2 ½ tbsp CannaButter

3 cups quick-cooking oats

1 cup peanut butter

½ cup bittersweet chocolate chips

½ cup semisweet chocolate chips

½ cup toffee bits

½ tsp kosher salt
directions:
1. Line a baking sheet with wax paper.


2. Combine the oats, peanut butter, chocolate chips, toffee bits, CannaButter and salt in a medium saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until the chocolate chips melt.

3. Scoop large spoonfuls of batter onto the baking sheet and sprinkle each cookie with extra toffee bits.

4. Freeze for 15 minutes before serving.

(note) - The cookies can be stored in the refrigerator in an air-tight container for 1 week.

5. Serve the once cookies have cooled
